cu.explanation_en: Setting the SCTP output streams to 100 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing SCTP connection failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of uplink slots to 10 exceeds the maximum allowed for the TDD pattern, causing configuration validation failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行時隙數設定為 10 超過 TDD 模式允許的最大值，導致配置驗證失敗。
